alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 5:02PM MST until July 30 at 5:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 545 PM MST. * At 501 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Queen Creek to near Estrella Sailport, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, Avondale, Goodyear, Apache Junction, East Mesa, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Queen Creek, Tempe Marketplace, Salt River Indian Community and South Phoenix. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 149 and 177. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 196. US Highway 60 between mile markers 173 and 197. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
